readable.title: 3503623999_bbd5dcfb18
readable.content: A man in a crowd wears a red hat and a red bandanna over his face . A person with dreadlocks and a red hat with their face covered by a red bandanna A woman wearing a hat and red scarf stands among others wearing similar clothes . A woman wearing a red hat and red bandanna followed by a man in a red bandanna . The lady is wearing a bandanna around her face to protect her from dust .
